title: 5 Best Albums of 2018 (So Far)
summary: Kendrick Lamar has proven himself to be one of the best artists in music with each album release. His previous album, “To Pimp a Butterfly,” was praised for its fusion of hip-hop, jazz, and poetry. “Melodrama” the second album from New Zealand singer Lorde is a concept album about the experience of growing up in suburbia. Ed Sheeran’s third studio album has been critically praised  for its mature, varied sound.

However, that doesn\u2019t mean there hasn\u2019t been some brilliant albums released so far this year. While last year had some incredible albums (like Kendrick Lamar\u2019s \u201CDamn,\u201D Lorde\u2019s \u201CMelodrama,\u201D and Noel Gallagher\u2019s High Flying Birds' "Who Built the Moon?"), this year hasn\u2019t quite matched up to those standards. However, we are only halfway through the year and as such, we have also seen some fantastic new albums released in the last few months that are worth mentioning. There may not be many great new albums out at the moment \u2013 but these five are definitely among the best.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

His previous album, \u201CTo Pimp a Butterfly,\u201D was praised for its fusion of hip-hop, jazz, and poetry. Given the acclaim that album received, expectations were inevitably high for \u201CDamn.\u201D All indications suggest this album will be remembered as the artist\u2019s magnum opus. The album\u2019s lead single, \u201CHumble,\u201D was one of the most popular tracks of 2017 and set a high bar for the rest of the album to live up to. The second single, \u201CDNA,\u201D has been critically praised for its innovative style. The album has been praised for its expansive, varied sound and thoughtful lyrics. \u201CDamn.\u201D is not only an exceptional album but also has the potential to be one of the best of the decade."),mdx("h2",null,'Lorde - "Melodrama"'),mdx("p",null,"\u201CMelodrama,\u201D the second album from New Zealand singer Lorde, is a concept album about the experience of growing up in suburbia. The album has a nostalgic, melancholy sound, with relatable lyrics that young people can relate to. The album has been critically praised for its expansive sound and its honest lyrics, which have been described as \u201Cincredibly familiar\u201D and \u201Clike a diary entry.\u201D The album\u2019s lead single, \u201CGreen Light,\u201D was praised for its nostalgic sound and relatable lyrics about growing up. The album has been critically praised for its nostalgic, melancholy sound and its honest lyrics. \u201CMelodrama\u201D is not only an exceptional album but also has the potential to be one of the best of the decade."),mdx("h2",null,"Shawn Mendes - Shawn Mendes"),mdx("p",null,"Canadian singer Shawn Mendes\u2019s debut album was praised for its mature sound that belied the artist\u2019s young age. The album has a pop sound but also incorporates country and rock elements. The album was praised for its lyrics, which are reflective and mature, given the artist\u2019s youth. The album was also praised for its varied sound and its interesting mix of genres. Mendes\u2019s first album was a commercial success and garnered critical praise, suggesting that the singer has a promising future ahead of him."),mdx("h2",null,"Ed Sheeran - \xF7 (Divide)"),mdx("p",null,"English singer Ed Sheeran\u2019s third studio album has been critically praised for its mature, varied sound. Sheeran has explored a variety of different musical genres on this album, including pop, rock, R&B, and even country. The album has been praised for its mature, honest lyrics, which are nostalgic and reflective. Given Sheeran\u2019s talent for writing relatable lyrics, it comes as no surprise that the album has been praised for its \u201Cauthenticity.\u201D The album has been commercially successful and garnered critical acclaim, suggesting that it is one of the best albums released so far this year. It may even go down as one of the best albums of the decade."),mdx("h2",null,"Marshmello - Joytime II"),mdx("p",null,"Electronic artist Marshmello\u2019s second album has been critically praised for its innovative style. The album incorporates a range of genres, including dubstep, house, hip-hop, and trap. The album has been praised for its unique, innovative sound. The album has been commercially successful and garnered critical acclaim, suggesting that Marshmello is set to become a household name in the music industry."),mdx("h2",null,"Khalid - Sunlight"),mdx("p",null,"American singer Khalid\u2019s debut album was critically praised for its authentic, emotive sound that is reminiscent of \u201990s R&B. The album has a nostalgic R&B sound that has been praised for its \u201Csimplicity\u201D and \u201Creminiscent\u201D lyrics. The album has been praised for its authentic and engaging sound that allows the listener to connect with the lyrics. The album has been commercially successful and garnered critical acclaim, suggesting that Khalid is ready to make a name for himself as one of the most important artists of the decade."),mdx("h2",null,"6lack - Free 6lack"),mdx("p",null,"Black singer 6lack\u2019s debut album has been critically praised for its honest and raw style. The album has a soulful sound, reminiscent of \u201990s R&B and hip-hop. The album has been praised for its honest lyrics about life. The album has garnered critical acclaim for its genuine and authentic sound. The album has been commercially successful and garnered critical acclaim, suggesting that 6lack is ready to make a name for himself as one of the most important artists of the decade."),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null,"While there have been some great albums released so far this year, it is important to note that we are halfway through the year. But there are still some great pop albums that aren\u2019t filled with auto-tune and EDM drops.On May 25th, the Scottish band Chvrches released their third album called \u201C Love is Dead.\u201D The synth-pop band has lots of happy vibes and catchy hooks on their new album. It\u2019s a pleasant listen but might not be what you expect if you only know them from their first two albums. The band took a left turn creatively, covering topics like technology, isolation and death rather than dancing around in your bedroom to this record.
Chvrses has gained more popularity among a different group of fans by releasing this album than they ever did with their first two releases combined. This is partially because they have expanded their audience by collaborating on songs with Haim and Bleachers recently as well as making this change in sound so now they have crossover appeal to radio listeners too!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Charlie Puth's 'Voicenotes' Is a Solid Effort

intro.compiledSource:
var p=Object.defineProperty,c=Object.defineProperties;var d=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var n=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var a=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,r=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(t,e,o)=>e in t?p(t,e,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:o}):t[e]=o,i=(t,e)=>{for(var o in e||(e={}))a.call(e,o)&&h(t,o,e[o]);if(n)for(var o of n(e))r.call(e,o)&&h(t,o,e[o]);return t},l=(t,e)=>c(t,d(e));var u=(t,e)=>{var o={};for(var s in t)a.call(t,s)&&e.indexOf(s)<0&&(o[s]=t[s]);if(t!=null&&n)for(var s of n(t))e.indexOf(s)<0&&r.call(t,s)&&(o[s]=t[s]);return o};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(o){var s=o,{components:t}=s,e=u(s,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,l(i(i({},layoutProps),e),{components:t,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`Charlie Puth has been on a roll lately, with three top 40 hits in the last two years. He\u2019s also worked with some pretty big names (including one we\u2019ll get to shortly). Now, he\u2019s back with another new album, titled \u201CVoicenotes.\u201D It\u2019s a solid effort that shows growth and maturity, as well as keeping Puth\u2019s fun and lighthearted style.
At its core, Voicenotes is an acoustic pop album. However, it goes deeper than just putting electric guitars aside; these songs are stripped right down to the bare bones. There\u2019s still plenty of production value\u2014especially on the third track\u2014but it feels like Puth made a conscious decision not to hide behind anything.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

More than ever before, people are listening to and talking about rappers. But with so much of the genre becoming commodified and predictable, it can be difficult for new artists to stand out among the noise. Fortunately, just because most popular rap fails to break any molds doesn\u2019t mean that the genre is completely devoid of creative talent. In fact, there are a number of rappers who have been working hard to maintain their integrity while still appealing to a larger audience. If you\u2019re ready to put on your dancing shoes and get out on the floor with one of these 10 amazing rappers who will make you want to dance:"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

The History of Hip Hop Music: The Influential Years

intro.compiledSource:
var u=Object.defineProperty,m=Object.defineProperties;var c=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var a=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var r=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,i=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(e,o,t)=>o in e?u(e,o,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:t}):e[o]=t,s=(e,o)=>{for(var t in o||(o={}))r.call(o,t)&&h(e,t,o[t]);if(a)for(var t of a(o))i.call(o,t)&&h(e,t,o[t]);return e},p=(e,o)=>m(e,c(o));var l=(e,o)=>{var t={};for(var n in e)r.call(e,n)&&o.indexOf(n)<0&&(t[n]=e[n]);if(e!=null&&a)for(var n of a(e))o.indexOf(n)<0&&i.call(e,n)&&(t[n]=e[n]);return t};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(t){var n=t,{components:e}=n,o=l(n,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,p(s(s({},layoutProps),o),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`Hip hop music is a universal language. It has proven to be a way for people from different cultures and backgrounds to come together and express themselves. From its humble beginnings in New York City, hip hop has grown into a worldwide sensation, with local scenes spawning in cities across the globe. This article explores the history of hip-hop music, from its roots as an underground movement in the early 1980s to its predominance as one of the most popular genres today.
Fans of rap music are undoubtedly aware that this style of music has origins in New York City during the 1970s and 1980s, but there is much more to know about how exactly it came about and how it evolved over time. From breakdancing to rapping, we\u2019ll explore all of the elements that blended together to form what we now call \u201Chip-hop\u201D today.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
